name: Into the box (Dabt)
description:
A short game made for the TiPs Lunar New Year Jam , following the theme "Hide or die".

You run and hide from monsters, don't get caught or you are dead! 

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space bar - Hide
  • Esc/P - Pause
  • K - Reset

Asset pack used: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
